description: Application for Variation of Condition 2 (approved plans) of Planning Permission P2013/0063/FUL dated 09/10/2014 for 'Demolition of existing garages, Oil tank building and 10 no. single storey bedsit units. Proposed building of 12 new single storey houses and one two storey house. Refurbishment of three garages to provide cycle store and mobility store. New lumber store in converted store. New landscape proposals for improvement of pedestrian areas, parking, planting, lighting and security. PV panel installation on roof of Emberton Court.' The variation consists of the retention and refurbishment of the existing bedsits.
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 24/06/2016.

Reason: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on [24/06/2013] [LBI ref: P2013/0063/FUL]. Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
